verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG0: cooker] [ARG1: sloppy joes] [ARGM-TMP: on hot summer days] this cooks without heating up the kitchen while i work on the rest of the meal it easy to double or triple for crowds and if there are any leftovers you can freeze them to enjoy later —carol losier baldwinsville new york
